subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sean Avery, one of the most energetic Rangers and their chief agitator, will have arthroscopic surgery on his left wrist Thursday and will be out indefinitely, the team announced Wednesday.
snippet: Sean Avery, one of the most energetic Rangers and their chief agitator, will have arthroscopic surgery on his left wrist Thursday and will be out indefinitely, the team announced Wednesday.
